divs: Sighting Detailsi was at family place for the evening and then was called by my brother to view what he had seen from the start another frind went to corner store and seen everything for the start as well when i came to what i have described above is what i seen. i was asked to view by my brother i looked for it. i was like no this cant be it came closer hovered for like 3 min and took of over and across the city directly above me and the changed speed and direction its was a mistereous curious feeling i had but excited when i realised what i had seen. it traveled and could not see it as there was building in the way.
Summary: started at the sea horizon and then came closer to hover and then rotated and took of right over the city and changed direction to the moon , very clear sighting
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 154 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around January 19th 2013
